overview: Babysitting Sistas are always looking for kids to watch with a kinky hidden agenda - to fuck the man of the house! So if your leaving him with the children when they come, don't you dare say that you weren't fore warned. These babysitters aren't the average, ugly couch potatoes you're used to hiring. They come dressed to impress and give good head! As soon as you walk out the door your kids will be sent to bed. So they can get their freak on in all the comforts of your home. These girls are hot and in search of fun, the nasty kind! Babysitting is the last thing on their mind!
title: Babysitting Sistas 2
